meanings.definition: One of the four pointed teeth in the human mouth, situated next to the incisors.
meanings.sent1: My eyetooth helps me bite into apples.
meanings.sent2: The dentist examined my eyetooth for cavities.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally bit my eyetooth while eating a sandwich.
meanings.sent4: Her eyetooth gleamed like a pearl in the sunlight.
meanings.sent5: The sharpness of the eyetooth made it perfect for tearing meat.

meanings.sent1: The eyetooth of the dog was chipped.
meanings.sent2: The eyetooth of the wolf was sharp and dangerous.
meanings.sent3: The dog's eyetooth peeked out when it growled playfully.
meanings.sent4: Her eyetooth was as white as fresh snow.
meanings.sent5: The eyetooth of the lion was a fearsome weapon in the wild.
